Class HuffmanCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • HuffmanCode

  • public class HuffmanCode
extends Object
    Implementation of Huffman coding. An instance of which stores a code used for subsequent encoding and decoding of strings.
    Version:
    12 October 2016
    Author:
    Bennett Alex Myers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HuffmanCode(HashMap<Character,Double> table)
      Creates a Huffman code for a given frequency table.
      HuffmanCode(Map<Character,StringOfBits> hmap)
      Creates a Huffman code for a given mapping of symbols to codes.
      HuffmanCode(String seed)
      Creates a Huffman code for a given seed string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String decode(StringOfBits encodedString)
      Decodes a bit string (0s and 1s) using the Huffman code of this object.
      StringOfBits encode(String inputString)
      Encodes a string using the Huffman code of this object.
      Map<Character,StringOfBits> getCode()
      Returns the mapping of symbols to codes for this object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Creates a Huffman code for a given seed string.

      • HuffmanCode

        public HuffmanCode(HashMap<Character,Double> table)
        Creates a Huffman code for a given frequency table.
        Parameters:
        table - the symbol frequency table from which the code is generated

      • HuffmanCode

        public HuffmanCode(Map<Character,StringOfBits> hmap)
        Creates a Huffman code for a given mapping of symbols to codes.
        Parameters:
        hmap - the mapping from symbols to their encodings.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public StringOfBits encode(String inputString)
        Encodes a string using the Huffman code of this object.
        Parameters:
        inputString - the string to be encoded
        Returns:
        the compressed encoding of the parameter

      • decode

        public String decode(StringOfBits encodedString)
        Decodes a bit string (0s and 1s) using the Huffman code of this object.
        Parameters:
        encodedString - the string to be decoded
        Returns:
        the decoded version of the parameter

      • getCode

        public Map<Character,StringOfBits> getCode()
